The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that an ancient evil is with them. Just when you think it can’t get worse than that group has to battle against possible desert casualties and man-eating lions.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was decent produced though.
That being said, as a piece of film history hate or love it it's importance and influence on future films can't be denied. Few movies have been copied so many times.
When you read "once upon a time" you know what's gonna happen even before tuning in.
